entries.abort: You..you're leaving us to our death pilot..
entries.arrived_at_loc: You are at the rendez-vous coordinates pilot, the freighter should be there any second.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.complete: Good job pilot, the freighter has jumped to lightspeed. Return to base.
entries.failed_destroy: We have lost contact with the freighter! You have some serious explanation to do pilot, return to base!
entries.failed_protect: We have lost contact with the freighter! You have some serious explanation to do pilot, return to base!
entries.found_loc: Rendez-vous with the personnel freighter at this location pilot. Protect it while the crew repair their hyperspace system.
entries.goodbye_1: Repairs complete, initiating jump to lightspeed. Thanks for the help pilot!
entries.goodbye_2: Repairs complete, initiating jump to lightspeed. Thanks for the help pilot!
entries.goodbye_3: Repairs complete, initiating jump to lightspeed. Thanks for the help pilot!
entries.goodbye_4: Repairs complete, initiating jump to lightspeed. Thanks for the help pilot!
entries.goodbye_5: Repairs complete, initiating jump to lightspeed. Thanks for the help pilot!
entries.hull_half: We are taking serious damage pilot!
entries.panic_1: I was wondering when they would be here.
entries.panic_2: I hope you're good at this pilot.
entries.panic_4: Son of a worrt, incoming lackeys of the Empire!
entries.quest_escort_d: The freighter crew is working as hard as they can to repair the hyperdrive system of their ship. Protect them from any attacks until they can perform their jump to lightspeed.
entries.quest_location_d: This area is extremely dangerous, the Empire is scouting it trying to find any of the freighters that did not manage to escape their attack. Be prepared for danger.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The freighter has requested that escort meet it at these coordinates. Get there immediately pilot.
entries.reason_1: Glad you were still here pilot. Protect us while we try to repair the hyperdrive systems.
entries.reason_2: Glad you were still here pilot. Protect us while we try to repair the hyperdrive systems.
entries.reason_3: Glad you were still here pilot. Protect us while we try to repair the hyperdrive systems.
entries.reason_4: Glad you were still here pilot. Protect us while we try to repair the hyperdrive systems.
entries.reason_5: Glad you were still here pilot. Protect us while we try to repair the hyperdrive systems.
entries.shields_depleted: Well there goes our shields. If you can't take care of these TIE's quickly, we're in deep trouble.
entries.taunt_2: Here's another one, lets take care of it!
entries.taunt_3: Our orders are simple men, leave none alive!
entries.taunt_4: Squad, listen up! Attack pattern Alpha!
entries.taunt_5: Time to teach these terrorists a lesson!
entries.thanks_1: We are still in one piece, lets keep moving!
entries.thanks_2: Great work pilot but we need more time to finish the repairs!
entries.thanks_3: Good job pilot, we're almost done here.
entries.thanks_5: Nice shot pilot, glad to have you with us!
entries.title: Endor system: Protect freighter while it repairs hyperdrive system.
entries.title_d: One of our personnel freighters have not been able to perform their jump to lightspeed due to a hyperdrive malfunction. We need you to provide escort of it while the crew repairs the broken system.
